dt-option.name: searchBuilder.enterSearch
dt-option.summary: Trigger a search on the enter key rather than every keypress

type.description: When true an enter keypress is required to trigger a search for an input element.

dt-option.description:
This option is an alias to `-feature searchBuilder.enterSearch`, which should be preferred when using DataTables 2+. It can be used to configure SearchBuilder regardless of how the panes are inserted into the document (`-init layout` or `-button searchBuilder`).
Please refer to the documentation for `-feature searchBuilder.enterSearch` for full details of this option.

example.title: Input searches to only occur on enter press
